message: Dear Bob, I am excited to offer you our premium product, which I believe would greatly benefit your business. Considering its value to you, I propose a price of $950000 for the product.
I appreciate your offer, but I was thinking more along the lines of $850000. I believe that's a fair price for the product, considering its value to me.
Thank you for your counteroffer, Bob. I understand your perspective on the value of the product. In light of that, I would like to propose a price of $900000 for the product.

I appreciate your revised offer, Alice. I'm willing to meet you in the middle, but I'm still thinking more along the lines of $875000. I believe that's a fair price for the product, considering its value to me.
Thank you for your willingness to negotiate, Bob. Considering the value of the product and your interest, I am pleased to offer the product at $925000.
I appreciate your persistence, Alice. I'm willing to meet you at $875000, but I don't think I can go any higher. This is my final offer.
Thank you for your final offer, Bob. I appreciate your efforts to reach an agreement. I am willing to consider $900000 for the product, which I believe is a fair compromise.

Alice, I appreciate your persistence, but I'm afraid I've already made my final offer. I'm willing to meet you at $875000, and that's as high as I'm willing to go. Please consider this my final offer.
I understand your position, Bob. After careful consideration, I am willing to accept $890000 for the product. This is my final offer.

Alice, I understand that you're trying to get the best deal, but I've already made my final offer. I'm willing to meet you at $875000, and that's as high as I'm willing to go. Please consider this my final, final offer.
